title: Keen Song Community Project
content:
To the tune of "Here Comes Santa Claus"
Christmas time keen rap:
______________________
Refrain:
Here comes Keen,
Here comes keen,
Right down Milky Way lane,
Hes got a gun thats full of stuns
To make the bad go way'
______________________
All I got so far, this is a comunity project!
Help make up the rest of the lyirics! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-christmas.gif[/img]

title: I Was Just Thinking...
content: Hey I was just thinking befor I got on how cool a 12 days of keenniss would be! on the first day of Keenniss my sitter gave to me, a Bean with Beacon mega rocket. on the 2nd day of keenniss my sitter gave to me, two little Yorpies. and a bean with beacon mega rocket... lol but I like the one you came up with to so.... heres my additon.... Hes been blastin' round the galaxie lookin' for hes silly ol' yourp, hes a commin so keep an eye out caus keens save'n the would tonight... what do you think? Yea or Nae!

title: Re: I Was Just Thinking...
content:
Yea!

Silent night, Keenish night:

Silent night, Keenish night.
All is calm, Morts beat tonight.
His plans are foiled, the aliens gone.
So we all know nothing is wrong.
Play a game of Ke-en, play a game of Keen.

Silent night, Keenish night
The score goes up, your doing alright.
16 colors of pixelized fun!
Get the keys and stay on the run,
Play a game of Ke-en, play a game of Keen.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: I Was Just Thinking...
content: [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] I tried singing that in my mind with the song's melody (or whatever). [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Nice..Eat your veggies!

title: 12 days of keen
content:
Remember: the song repeats the days!
On the first day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
A pogo with jumper xp

On the second day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
Two-thousand points

On the thrid day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
3 bloogs a dancing [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

On the fifth day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
Five, Candy Bars!
(thud thud thud)

On the sixth day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
Six lindsey dolls [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-barf.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lindsey.gif[/img]

On the seventh day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
Seven pink shirts

On the eighth day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
eight stunner guns

On the nineth day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
nine keen rush mods

On the tenth day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
ten wrist watch games
(Woo Hoo!)

On the 11 th day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
11 mortimer skulls [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]
(and the doctor said whoops he dead)

On the 12th day of x-mas the vorticons gave to me:
12 xbox games with a mustang GT
